import axios from "axios"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import config from "../../Config/config"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import time from "../../TimeFunctions"; export default function ImageViewer(props) { const data = props.match.params.number; const [show, setShow] = useState(true); const [imageInfo, setImageInfo] = useState(""); const [userName, setUserName] = useState(""); const [updater, setUpdater] = useState(true); const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const [comment, setComment] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { axios.post(`${config.backendUrl}imageinfo`, { _id: data }).then((res) => { setImageInfo(res.data); setMessage(res.data.likedby.includes(localStorage.getItem("email"))); }); }, [updater]); useEffect(() => { const id = localStorage.getItem("email"); axios.post(`${config.backendUrl}userdata`, { email: id }).then((res) => { setUserName(res.data.fname + " " + res.data.lname); }); }, []); function handleLike(event) { event.email = localStorage.getItem("email"); if (updater == true) { axios .post(`${config.backendUrl}likes`, event) .then((res) => console.log(res.data)) .then(() => setUpdater(!updater)); } else { axios .post(`${config.backendUrl}dislikes`, event) .then((res) => console.log(res.data)) .then(() => setUpdater(!updater)); } } function handleComment() { const data = { _id: props.match.params.number, comment: comment, email: localStorage.getItem("email"), date: new Date(), }; axios .post(`${config.backendUrl}comment`, data) .then((res) => console.log(res.data)); } return (
